bibl.bibl: Hafner, Arthur Wayne, ed. 1993. Directory of deceased American physicians, 1804–1929: a genealogical guide to over 149,000 medical practitioners providing brief biographical sketches drawn from the American Medical Association’s deceased physician masterfile. 2 vols. Chicago: American Medical Association.
bibl.idno: ancestry.com; WorldCat (take the first entry and scroll down to get no. of vols. and Hafner as editor)
